name: BOXiGON! (itch)
description:
WELCOME to BOXiGON!

A 3D world of stimulating color PUZZLES!
Align the PATTERN and become BOXiGON~MASTER!
Can you unlock the boxigon?

FEATURES:
   ~ 4 SKILL-LEVELS: 
                - NEWB, PRO, NEO, MASTER.

   ~ 8 PUZZLE-DIMENSIONS: 
    - SIMPLEX, FLOWERGARDEN, GRIDPRYZM, RADIASTAR, 
    - COLORTEMPLE, STARLOCK, COREONE, CORETWO; BOXiGON.

   ~ 72 VARIATIONS to become BOXiGON~MASTER!

INSTRUCTIONS:
   ~ ALIGN color TILES with ORBS.
   ~ Click or touch TILE to DRAG.
   ~ Click ORB to see HINTS.
   ~ TEXT TIPS in the lower-left.

TIPS:

   ~  Progressively  difficult.
   ~ Look for BONUS~POINTS!
   ~ Solve your way to BOXiGON~MASTER!

WARNING:
  Low-fidelity planetary-explosions. 

CONTACT US: 
Twitter at BOXiGON.

Thank you for playing.
